title: Cursors at 4K Resolution
body:
I want to apologize to the admin or mod that did message me, I truly mean it, I found it after I posted again in the wrong subforum.

I've recently purchased a 4K monitor and a GTX 980 Ti to go with it. The cursor is TINY, and much of the interface is too small, especially the launch screen.

If there's a fix, I can't find it, I've hunted through the settings. If not, please give us an option. 4K is spreading and if there's no option, you guys are way behind. :(

replies.body:
Full 4K support is definitely something we're looking into, but don't currently have a full offering for. At the moment, some items in League scale well with 4K, however, the User Interface and cursor currently don't. Running your in-game resolution at **1920x1080** and selecting **Fullscreen** should serve as a workaround for now, but keep in mind if you *Alt+Tab* out of the game at any point during a match, your UI and mouse may rescale to 4K and look tiny again. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

But when is it gonna be fix tho? It is trurly frustrating because i just bought a gaming computer with a 4k screen without knowing that the game i actually play the most doesnt support 4k. And i also think this must be sorted quickly as 4k monitors are getting more and more widespread and i can see that a lot of people have the same problem like me as i surf through the internet to try to find the cure for the problem. I sincerely hope that riot can fix it and it will make a lot of peoples' lives easier.
Btw a quick way of getting the cursor to rescale without having to quit game is to enable color blind mode and disable it again. That makes the cursor rescale again if i Alt+Tab out of the game
What exactly do you mean? Are you saying the resolution of the game is extremely small?
